name: Dragon Fist - Cute Magic City Running Action Game For Kids FREE
name_original: Dragon Fist - Cute Magic City Running Action Game For Kids FREE
description:
******* Free Dragon Arcade Game! *******

******* Addicting platformer action ****** *

Help our big, cuddly dragon collect coins in his biggest adventure ever!

Run and jump your way through worlds of intense platforming madness in this tough-as-nails classic arcade game! This is a retro-style platformer with cute animation, awesome soundtrack and challenging levels!

With exceptionally clever level design, gorgeous graphics and solid platform dynamics you'll want to keep playing and playing.

Have you got what it takes to win in this classic side scrolling action adventure?

Features:

* Multiple levels of excitement
* Awesome animations
* Optimized performance
* Smooth and polished gameplay
* Exciting music tracks

Harness the power of pure fun!

Download FREE Today!
